title: Fullstack Engineer
description:
• Developing and maintaining fullstack web application for managing electric car chargers

• Technical, analytical and business thinking of new features and products

• Great team collaboration between my colleagues, directors, end users and factory workers

• Development of hardware products

• Deep knowledge of electric chargers and their technologies, protocols and APIs

• Collaboration with firmware team to deliver fully working software

• Additions to software in features as: auto-updating, system services, automatically managed internet connection and mainly the installation process of newly built chargers

• Development of a public charging application that holds payment gate, remote autorization of chargers and the entire control system

• Outstanding results in a little to no time, great knowledge of problem solving and solutions

• Never ending process of learning new technologies and protocols

• Maintaing of already set up Infrastructure as a Service

• Set up docker swarm and an entire fleet of micro-services

• Conversion to docker supported application and migration from IaaS to PaaS

title: Fullstack Web Developer

title: Game Development Teacher

• Creating final project and reviewing student work with constructive feedback and helping them making their final game flawless
